This course will be lectured in English. Students will learn the basic of computer programming, logical thinking, and numerical methods. The selected computer language is Fortran 95/2003/2008. Python will also be lectured in the end of the course.

Please prepare a laptop, and please bring it to the class.
schedule:
01. Introduction for computer programming, linux, ubuntu, etc.
02. Basic Linux commands and vim editor
03. Code structure of Fortran & The compilation. Some simple codes.
04. Data types, declaration, formatted input and output
05. Math and functions
06. If and case
07. Do loop
08. Array
09. Files
10. Subroutine, module, and function
11. Numerical method
12. Random number generator and statistics
13. Python 3
